short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This tool is for easy saving urls of your series. Control the number of seasons and series

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Store all your TV shows by episode and season in one expansion. The extension works like a notebook.
With one click, go to your saved pages and enjoy the content you are viewing.

The extension is absolutely free.
The extension does not require an internet connection.

App Description:
* Add or remove TV shows, movies or any notes from web pages.
* Control the season number and episode of your favorite content
